newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft to release test copy of Explorer 4.0-NYT.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft to release test copy of Explorer 4.0-NYT.

text.p: Microsoft Corp intends to announce on Tuesday plans for releasing a test copy of the newest version of its Internet Explorer program for browsing the World Wide Web, the New York Times said Monday.
The company's Internet Explorer 4.0 is the fourth version of the Explorer program in little more than a year, the paper said.
